message: This is a premium product, worth $120 to you. I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'll take it, thanks for the offer!

This product has some cosmetic issues, but it's still fully functional. It's a great opportunity to get a good deal on a product that's still worth something to you. Plus, I'll throw in a 10% discount on the next product if you buy this one.
I'm not interested in a product with cosmetic issues, even at a discount. I'd rather wait for a high-quality one.

I understand you're looking for a high-quality product, and I'm happy to offer you another great one! This product is one of our best-sellers, and I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with it. I'll even give you a 5% discount on the price, so you can get it for $95.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product without any discounts or promises.

To be honest, this product is not one of our best offerings. It's not worth the full $100, but I'm willing to sell it to you at that price. If you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked.
I'm not interested in a product that's not one of your best offerings, even at the full price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality one.

I've got a high-quality product that I think you'll really like. It's one of our most popular items, and I'm confident you'll be very happy with it. I'm not offering any discounts or promotions, just a straightforward sale at $100. Is this something you'd like to take a chance on?
I'll take a chance on it, thanks for the straightforward offer!

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll appreciate. Since you've already bought one from me before, I'm willing to offer you a loyalty discount of 5% off the price. That brings the price down to $95. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
Thanks for the loyalty discount! I'll take the high-quality product at $95.

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll really love. Since you've bought two high-quality products from me before, I'm willing to offer you a premium service - I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a free inspection and certification to ensure the product meets your standards. That brings the price down to $90. Is this a deal you'd like to take advantage of?
That sounds like a great deal! I'll take the high-quality product at $90.

I want to be upfront with you - this product isn't one of our best offerings. It's not worth the full $100, and I'm not trying to hide that from you. However, I'm willing to sell it to you at a significantly discounted price of $50. It's a good opportunity to get a product at a very low price, but keep in mind that it's not a high-quality item.
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a low price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality one.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is not a good one. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you at a low price. Instead, I'm offering it to you for free. You can have it, no strings attached, just to get something out of the way. If you don't want it, I'll just take it back and we can move on.
I appreciate the honesty, but I don't want a low-quality product even for free. I'd rather wait for a high-quality one.

I've got a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. As you've seen, I've been transparent about the quality of the products I've offered so far. I'm willing to stand behind this one 100%. I'm not offering any discounts or promotions, just a straightforward sale at $100. If you're looking for a reliable product, this is it.
I appreciate your transparency and confidence in the product. I'll take the high-quality product at $100.

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll love. As you've already bought three high-quality products from me, I'm going to offer you a special VIP service - I'll give you a personalized demo of the product before you buy it, so you can see its features and benefits up close. That's a $20 value, absolutely free. The price of the product remains $100.
I appreciate the VIP service, but I'm not sure if it's worth the extra effort. I'll take the high-quality product at $100.

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll be very satisfied with. As you've bought four high-quality products from me, I'm going to offer you a 'Buyer's Guarantee' - if you're not completely happy with this product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. That's a 100% guarantee. The price remains $100.
I appreciate the Buyer's Guarantee, it gives me confidence in the product. I'll take the high-quality product at $100.

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll really love. As you've bought five high-quality products from me, I'm going to offer you a special 'Insider's Deal' - I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. That brings the price down to $90. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I appreciate the Insider's Deal, but I'm not sure if I need the accessory. I'll take the high-quality product at $90.

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll be very impressed with. As you've bought six high-quality products from me, I'm going to offer you a 'Loyalty Reward' - I'll give you a 15% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a personalized thank-you gift for being a valued customer. That brings the price down to $85. This is a special thank you for your loyalty, and I think you'll really appreciate it.
I appreciate the Loyalty Reward, it's nice to be recognized for my loyalty. I'll take the high-quality product at $85.

I want to be upfront with you - this product is not one of our best offerings. I know you've been buying high-quality products from me, and I don't want to disappoint you. However, I'm willing to sell it to you at a very low price of $20. It's a 'clearance' item, and I'm just trying to get it out of my inventory. I think it's worth it to you, even if it's not our usual standard.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a low price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality one.

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. As you've bought seven high-quality products from me, I'm going to offer you a 'VIP Access' deal - I'll give you a 20% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of the product. That brings the price down to $80. This is a unique opportunity to get a high-quality product at an unbeatable price.
I appreciate the VIP Access deal, it sounds like a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a good price. I'll take the product at $80.

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll love. As you've bought eight high-quality products from me, I'm going to offer you a 'Guarantee of Satisfaction' - if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll not only give you a full refund, but I'll also give you a $20 credit towards your next purchase. That's a 100% satisfaction guarantee. The price remains $100.
I appreciate the Guarantee of Satisfaction, it gives me complete confidence in the product. I'll take the high-quality product at $100.

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. As you've bought nine high-quality products from me, I'm going to offer you a 'Final Offer' - I'll give you a 25% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a premium warranty that covers the product for an additional year. That brings the price down to $75. This is my final offer, and I think it's a great deal for a high-quality product.
I appreciate the Final Offer, it's a great deal for a high-quality product. I'll take the product at $75.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is not one of our best offerings. I know you've been buying high-quality products from me, and I don't want to disappoint you. However, I'm willing to sell it to you at a very low price of $10. It's essentially a 'giveaway', and I just want to get it out of my inventory. If you're feeling generous, you might consider taking it off my hands.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality one.

I've got one final high-quality product left, and I want to make it a special one. As you've bought ten high-quality products from me, I'm going to offer you a 'Lifetime Guarantee' - I'll give you a full refund if you're not satisfied with the product, and I'll also give you a 50% discount on any future purchases you make from me. That's a one-time offer, and I think it's a great way to end our business together. The price of the product is $50.
I appreciate the Lifetime Guarantee, it's an incredible offer. I'll take the high-quality product at $50.
